about_the_game:
Full soundtrack to the dungeon crawler game Into The Inferno, composed and produced by Bloodless Mushroom.

The main menu, intro, and victory songs are all short tunes played on classical guitar, while the six area themes are long-form evolving 1990s-style MIDI songs with changing repetitions.

What better accompaniment for a 1990s DRPG than some MIDI compositions in the period style?
